content.json:
# Perimeter 81 Event Dashboard

This dashboard provides Perimeter 81 visualization of geographic security events analytics capabilities.

parameters.name: EventTypes
parameters.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| distinct eventTypeGroup_s
| order by eventTypeGroup_s asc

content.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend 
    Latitude = geoPoint_latitude_d,
    Longitude = geoPoint_longitude_d,
    EventType = eventTypeGroup_s,
    EventName = eventName_s,
    SourceIP = ip_s,
    Country = addressCountry_s,
    TenantId = tenantId_s,
    UserEmail = releasedBy_email_s,
    TimeZone = geoPoint_time_zone_s,
    AccuracyRadius = geoPoint_accuracy_radius_d
| where isnotnull(Latitude) and isnotnull(Longitude)
| where Latitude between (-90.0 .. 90.0) and Longitude between (-180.0 .. 180.0)
| summarize 
    EventCount = count(),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(SourceIP),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserEmail),
    UniqueTenants = dcount(TenantId),
    UniqueEventTypes = dcount(EventType),
    EventTypeList = make_list(EventType),
    EventNameList = make_list(EventName),
    CountryList = make_list(Country),
    UserList = make_list(UserEmail),
    IPList = make_list(SourceIP),
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    AvgAccuracy = avg(AccuracyRadius),
    TimeZoneInfo = take_any(TimeZone)
    by Latitude, Longitude
| extend 
    LocationKey = strcat(round(Latitude, 4), ",", round(Longitude, 4)),
    Duration = LastSeen - FirstSeen,
    EventsPerHour = round(EventCount / (datetime_diff('hour', LastSeen, FirstSeen) + 1), 2)
| extend
    RiskLevel = case(
        EventCount >= 100 and UniqueIPs >= 10, "Critical",
        EventCount >= 50 and UniqueIPs >= 5, "High",
        EventCount >= 20 or UniqueIPs >= 3, "Medium",
        EventCount >= 5, "Low",
        "Minimal"
    ),
    ThreatIndicator = case(
        UniqueTenants >= 3, "Multi-Tenant",
        UniqueIPs >= 10, "Distributed",
        EventCount >= 50, "High-Volume",
        "Standard"
    ),
    GeoPrecision = case(
        AvgAccuracy <= 10, "Very High",
        AvgAccuracy <= 100, "High",
        AvgAccuracy <= 1000, "Medium",
        "Low"
    )
| extend
    ActivityWindow = strcat(
        format_datetime(FirstSeen, 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm'),
        " - ",
        format_datetime(LastSeen, 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm')
    ),
    LocationSummary = strcat(
        "Lat: ", round(Latitude, 4), 
        ", Lon: ", round(Longitude, 4),
        " (", TimeZoneInfo, ")"
    ),
    ThreatScore = case(
        RiskLevel == "Critical", 90 + (UniqueIPs * 2),
        RiskLevel == "High", 70 + UniqueIPs,
        RiskLevel == "Medium", 50 + (UniqueIPs / 2),
        RiskLevel == "Low", 25 + (EventCount / 10),
        10
    ),
    PrimaryCountry = case(
        array_length(CountryList) > 0, tostring(CountryList[0]),
        "Unknown"
    )
| project 
    Latitude, 
    Longitude, 
    LocationKey,
    LocationSummary,
    EventCount, 
    UniqueIPs, 
    UniqueUsers, 
    UniqueTenants,
    UniqueEventTypes,
    RiskLevel,
    ThreatIndicator,
    ThreatScore,
    PrimaryCountry,
    EventsPerHour,
    Duration,
    ActivityWindow,
    GeoPrecision,
    AvgAccuracy,
    TimeZoneInfo,
    EventTypeList,
    EventNameList,
    CountryList,
    UserList,
    IPList,
    FirstSeen,
    LastSeen
content.title: Geographic Threat Map

content.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend EventType = eventTypeGroup_s
| summarize EventCount = count() by EventType
| order by EventCount desc
| render piechart
content.title: Event Distribution by Type

content.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend 
    EventType = eventTypeGroup_s,
    Country = addressCountry_s,
    SourceIP = ip_s
| summarize 
    EventCount = count(),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(SourceIP),
    UniqueCountries = dcount(Country)
    by Country
| where isnotempty(Country)
| order by EventCount desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Countries by Event Count

content.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend EventType = eventTypeGroup_s
| summarize EventCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), EventType
| render timechart
content.title: Event Timeline by Type

content.query:
let EventData = Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend 
    Latitude = geoPoint_latitude_d,
    Longitude = geoPoint_longitude_d,
    EventType = eventTypeGroup_s,
    EventName = eventName_s,
    SourceIP = ip_s,
    Country = addressCountry_s,
    UserEmail = releasedBy_email_s,
    TenantId = tenantId_s,
    OriginalTenantId = originalTenantId_s,
    ApplicationName = application_name_s,
    ApplicationType = application_type_s,
    DeviceType = device_deviceType_s,
    DeviceHostname = device_hostname_s;

let LocationStats = EventData
| where isnotnull(Latitude) and isnotnull(Longitude)
| summarize 
    EventCount = count(),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(SourceIP),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserEmail),
    UniqueTenants = dcount(TenantId),
    UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceHostname),
    UniqueApps = dcount(ApplicationName),
    EventTypes = make_set(EventType),
    EventNames = make_set(EventName),
    Countries = make_set(Country),
    UserList = make_set(UserEmail),
    IPList = make_set(SourceIP),
    TenantList = make_set(TenantId),
    DeviceList = make_set(DeviceHostname),
    AppList = make_set(ApplicationName),
    DeviceTypeList = make_set(DeviceType),
    AppTypeList = make_set(ApplicationType),
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
    by Latitude, Longitude
| extend 
    LocationLabel = strcat("(", round(Latitude, 4), ", ", round(Longitude, 4), ")"),
    Duration = LastSeen - FirstSeen
| extend
    RiskScore = case(
        UniqueUsers > UniqueDevices * 3 and (AppTypeList has "Terminal" or AppTypeList has "RDP" or AppTypeList has "Citrix"), "Low - Terminal Server",
        UniqueIPs > UniqueUsers and EventCount >= 50 and not(AppTypeList has "Terminal" or AppTypeList has "RDP" or AppTypeList has "Citrix"), "Critical - Unusual IP Pattern",
        UniqueUsers > UniqueDevices * 2 and EventCount >= 30, "Medium - Shared Devices",
        UniqueDevices == 1 and UniqueIPs >= 5 and array_length(Countries) >= 2, "Critical - Mobile Device Compromise",
        UniqueIPs >= 20 and UniqueUsers <= 5 and not(AppTypeList has "Terminal" or AppTypeList has "RDP" or AppTypeList has "Citrix"), "Critical - Concentrated IPs",
        UniqueTenants >= 3 and EventCount >= 50, "Critical - Multi-Tenant",
        EventCount >= 200 and UniqueUsers <= 3 and not(AppTypeList has "Terminal" or AppTypeList has "RDP" or AppTypeList has "Citrix"), "Critical - High Volume",
        EventCount >= 100 and UniqueIPs >= 10 and (UniqueIPs <= UniqueUsers * 1.5), "High - Corporate Activity",
        EventCount >= 50 and UniqueUsers >= 10, "Medium - Multi-User Location",
        EventCount >= 20, "Low",
        "Minimal"
    ),
    ThreatLevel = case(
        UniqueTenants >= 5 and EventCount >= 50, "Multi-Tenant Threat",
        UniqueIPs >= 10 and EventCount >= 30, "Distributed Attack",
        EventCount >= 100, "High Volume",
        "Normal Activity"
    ),
    PrimaryCountry = case(
        array_length(Countries) > 0, tostring(Countries[0]),
        "Unknown"
    )
| extend
    UserSummary = case(
        UniqueUsers <= 3, strcat("Users: ", strcat_array(UserList, ", ")),
        strcat("Users: ", UniqueUsers, " total (Top 3: ", strcat_array(array_slice(UserList, 0, 3), ", "), "...)")
    ),
    IPSummary = case(
        UniqueIPs <= 3, strcat("IPs: ", strcat_array(IPList, ", ")),
        strcat("IPs: ", UniqueIPs, " total (First 3: ", strcat_array(array_slice(IPList, 0, 3), ", "), "...)")
    ),
    TenantSummary = case(
        UniqueTenants <= 2, strcat("Tenants: ", strcat_array(TenantList, ", ")),
        strcat("Tenants: ", UniqueTenants, " total")
    ),
    EventTypeSummary = strcat_array(EventTypes, ", "),
    DeviceSummary = case(
        UniqueDevices <= 3, strcat("Devices: ", strcat_array(DeviceList, ", ")),
        strcat("Devices: ", UniqueDevices, " total (First 3: ", strcat_array(array_slice(DeviceList, 0, 3), ", "), "...)")
    ),
    AppSummary = case(
        UniqueApps <= 3, strcat("Apps: ", strcat_array(AppList, ", ")),
        strcat("Apps: ", UniqueApps, " total (Top 3: ", strcat_array(array_slice(AppList, 0, 3), ", "), "...)")
    )
| order by EventCount desc;

LocationStats
| project 
    ThreatLevel, 
    RiskScore, 
    PrimaryCountry,
    EventCount,
    UniqueUsers, 
    UniqueTenants, 
    UniqueIPs,
    UniqueDevices,
    UniqueApps,
    UserSummary,
    IPSummary,
    DeviceSummary,
    //AppSummary,
    TenantSummary,
    EventTypeSummary,
    //Duration,
    FirstSeen, 
    LastSeen, 
    LocationLabel
content.title: High-Risk Locations with User & Device Details

content.query:
Perimeter81_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{EventTypes:escape}" == "*" or eventTypeGroup_s in ({EventTypes})
| extend 
    EventType = eventTypeGroup_s,
    EventName = eventName_s,
    UserEmail = releasedBy_email_s,
    SourceIP = ip_s,
    Country = addressCountry_s,
    TenantId = tenantId_s
| extend
    UserDomain = case(
        isnotempty(UserEmail), split(UserEmail, "@")[1],
        "Unknown"
    ),
    DeviceFingerprint = strcat(SourceIP, "-", Country),
    TimeHour = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| where isnotempty(UserEmail)
| summarize 
    EventCount = count(),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(SourceIP),
    UniqueCountries = dcount(Country),
    UniqueTenants = dcount(TenantId),
    EventNames = make_set(EventName),
    Countries = make_set(Country),
    IPAddresses = make_set(SourceIP),
    FirstActivity = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated),
    ActivityHours = dcount(TimeHour)
    by UserEmail, UserDomain, EventType
| extend 
    ActivityDuration = LastActivity - FirstActivity,
    RiskProfile = case(
        UniqueIPs >= 10 and UniqueCountries >= 3, "High Risk - Global Activity",
        UniqueIPs >= 5 and UniqueCountries >= 2, "Medium Risk - Multi-Location",
        EventCount >= 100, "High Volume User",
        UniqueTenants >= 2, "Multi-Tenant Access",
        "Standard Activity"
    ),
    UserType = case(
        UserDomain in ("gmail.com", "yahoo.com", "hotmail.com", "outlook.com"), "Personal Email",
        UserDomain contains "temp" or UserDomain contains "test", "Test Account",
        "Corporate Email"
    ),
    GeographicSpread = case(
        UniqueCountries >= 5, "Global",
        UniqueCountries >= 3, "Regional", 
        UniqueCountries >= 2, "Multi-Country",
        "Local"
    ),
    DeviceMobility = case(
        UniqueIPs >= 20, "Highly Mobile",
        UniqueIPs >= 10, "Mobile",
        UniqueIPs >= 5, "Semi-Mobile",
        "Static"
    )
| extend
    ThreatLevel = case(
        RiskProfile contains "High Risk", 4,
        RiskProfile contains "Medium Risk", 3,
        RiskProfile contains "High Volume", 3,
        RiskProfile contains "Multi-Tenant", 4,
        1
    )
| project 
    UserEmail,
    UserDomain,
    UserType,
    EventType,
    EventCount,
    UniqueIPs,
    UniqueCountries,
    UniqueTenants,
    ActivityHours,
    RiskProfile,
    GeographicSpread,
    DeviceMobility,
    ThreatLevel,
    ActivityDuration,
    FirstActivity,
    LastActivity,
    EventNames,
    Countries,
    IPAddresses
| order by ThreatLevel desc, EventCount desc
content.title: User & Device Activity Analysis by Event Type
